arts.ttl: Ligue 1 round-up as promising teenager opens PSG account
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain returned to the summit of Ligue 1 on Saturday as they saw off Strasbourg with a 4-2 victory at home. 18-year-old midfielder Senny Mayulu opened the scoring with the first league goal of his fledgling career, before Marco Asensio doubled their lead just after the break. Seko Marou got one back for the [â€¦] The post Ligue 1 round-up as promising teenager opens PSG account first appeared on The Football Faithful.
